entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 13
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW THIS MORNING

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 6 ABOVE
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 3 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 15
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF FLURRIES IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
